scripts.build-demo: cd examples/demo && cross-env REACT_APP_DATA_PROVIDER=rest yarn -s build
scripts.test-unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu jest
scripts.test-unit-ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu jest --runInBand
scripts.test-e2e: yarn run -s build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test && cd cypress && yarn -s test
scripts.run-tutorial: yarn run -s build && cd examples/tutorial && yarn -s start
scripts.run-demo: yarn run -s build && cd examples/demo && cross-env REACT_APP_DATA_PROVIDER=rest yarn -s start
scripts.run-graphql-demo: yarn run -s build && cd examples/demo && cross-env REACT_APP_DATA_PROVIDER=graphql yarn -s start
scripts.run-graphcool-demo: yarn run -s build && cd examples/graphcool-demo && yarn -s start
